caption:
“I saw a new heaven and a new earth.” — Revelation 21:1

Reflection:
The old world fades like mist before morning light. Renewal dawns where faith refuses despair.

Commentary:
This verse proclaims the ultimate hope — that all creation will be restored. The prophet’s vision is not escape, but transformation through divine promise.
